about_the_game:
Ling Notes - Xiaobai (Xie Bian). Tea Baichun Silk Cloth DLC (attached with 29999 Ling coins) contains - Xiaobai (Xie Bian). Tea Baichun Silk Clothing DLC costumes, accompanied by DLC Ling coins.

_The world is short as a dream and the human relationship is weak as autumn.
_Cloud spring silk dress lined with embroidered Phoenix T-shirt, showing a thorough look, such as Yaolin Qiongshu, can be called a dust surface.
Girdle seeds around your waist with a jade belt to show your gentleman's attitude.
